#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define MAX(a,b) ((a) > (b) ? (a) : (b))
using namespace std;

int base(int num)
{
    int b=1,r;
    while(num)
    {
       r=num%10;
       num/=10;
       b=MAX(b,r);
    }
    return b+1;
}

int calc(int num, int b)
{
    int s=0,r,p=1;
    while(num)
    {
       r=num%10;
       s=r*p+s;
       num/=10;
       p*=b;
    }
    return s;
}
int main()
{
    int T;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--)
    {
        int A,B;
        int B1,B2;
        scanf("%d%d",&A,&B);
        B1=base(A);
        B2=base(B);

        printf("%d\n",calc(A,B1)+calc(B,B2));

        //printf("bases are %d and %d\nNumbers are %d and %d\n",B1,B2,calc(A,B1),calc(B,B2));

    }
    return 0;
}
